plugins.name: vault-worktree
plugins.description: Automate Vault project version and branch switching with git worktrees. Reduces manual version changes from 20-40 minutes to <5 seconds. Now with persistent configuration and primary worktree support (v2.0).
plugins.migration-guide:
Run: /vault-worktree:worktree-init
Automatic migration from v1.x with zero manual work

2.0.0: NEW: Branch-based directory naming (vault-R2027.1 instead of vault-2027)
NEW: Primary worktree concept - designate main development version
NEW: Automatic cleanup of v1.x style directories
IMPROVED: Better status display with primary marker
BREAKING: Old v1.x directory names no longer supported
1.0.0: Initial release with basic version switching
